data.eml:eml: Anophtalmic and epigean? Description of an intriguing new species of Hyalella (Amphipoda, Hyalellidae) from Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bastos-Pereira, Rafaela, Oliveira, Marcus Paulo Alves De, Ferreira, Rodrigo L. (2018): Anophtalmic and epigean? Description of an intriguing new species of Hyalella (Amphipoda, Hyalellidae) from Brazil. Zootaxa 4407 (2): 254-266, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4407.2.6
